metadata.title: CVE-2024-31111 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Automattic WordPress allows StoredXSS.This issue affects WordPress: from 6.5 through 6.5.4, from 6.4 through6.4.4, from 6.3 through 6.3.4, from 6.2 through 6.2.5, from 6.1 through6.1.6, from 6.0 through 6.0.8, from 5.9 through 5.9.9.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
